file.title: Open Excel

p.text: The command opens Excel database and displays a specified table. There is no option to save a table in Excel format after it has been changed. Also keep in mind that only Excel 8.0 opens. If your Excel table does not open use: Projects\Examples\Difficult projects\Table2\Excel Base.xls
